article.headline: Florida Gulf Coast 72, S.C.-Upstate 69
article.story: FORT MYERS, Fla. (AP) -- Casey Wohlleb scored 19 points as Fla. Gulf Coast rallied for a 70-67 win over South Carolina-Upstate on Sunday in Atlantic Sun Conference action. Landon Adler added 16 points 14 in the second half as Fla. Gulf Coast (9-15, 5-6) rallied from a 36-24 halftime deficit. Delvin Franklins 3-pointer gave the Eagles the lead for good at 60-58 with 6:31 left. They increased the lead to as many as six points. South Carolina-Upstate (6-19, 4-7) came back and had a chance to tie but Luke Payne's 3-pointer at the buzzer fell short. Payne scored 15 for the Spartans while Josh Chavis and Jeremy Byrd both had 12 points. Both Fla. Gulf Coast and South Carolina-Upstate are in their first seasons in Division I and the Atlantic Sun Conference.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
